guide.conclusion:
Make:Projects user vincent has contributed a few sample backgrounds he has designed. They are in a PDF file at the top of this guide.

Thank you for reading. I hope you understand this guide and use it to help your own YouTube channel!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In this project, you will learn the basics to creating a nice and neat YouTube background. This will help to display information to your viewers.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this project, you will learn the basics to creating a nice and neat YouTube background. This will help to display information to your viewers.

Tools
  • Computer
  • internet

lines.text: Here is an example of a nice-looking YouTube channel that has a great background. You may want to notice a few things...
lines.text_raw: Here is an example of a nice-looking YouTube channel that has a great background. You may want to notice a few things...

lines.text: First off, the name of the channel in included in the background. This shows the user that this background is custom made.
lines.text_raw: First off, the name of the channel in included in the background. This shows the user that this background is custom made.

lines.text: Second, there is an iPhone to the other side. This shows the main topic of the channel, iPhones.
lines.text_raw: Second, there is an iPhone to the other side. This shows the main topic of the channel, iPhones.

lines.text: Lastly, everything is fitted close to the middle because some computer screens won't be able to display what is on the ends.
lines.text_raw: Lastly, everything is fitted close to the middle because some computer screens won't be able to display what is on the ends.

lines.text: Now there are two ways to do this.
lines.text_raw: Now there are two ways to do this.

lines.text: You can use an existing background and modify it into a custom one.
lines.text_raw: You can use an existing background and modify it into a custom one.

lines.text: Or you can start from scratch to make a totally custom background.
lines.text_raw: Or you can start from scratch to make a totally custom background.

lines.text: To the right is an example of one that was created totally custom. Most totally custom ones take more time and more experience with a computer.
lines.text_raw: To the right is an example of one that was created totally custom. Most totally custom ones take more time and more experience with a computer.

lines.text: For a half-custom background (one where you use a pre-made background), you can get backgrounds from the following sites...
lines.text_raw: For a half-custom background (one where you use a pre-made background), you can get backgrounds from the following sites...

lines.text: Now you will use a program such as Paint or Google Drawings to add text or pictures.
lines.text_raw: Now you will use a program such as Paint or Google Drawings to add text or pictures.

lines.text: I found a blank background online and added text to the sides to make it my own
lines.text_raw: I found a blank background online and added text to the sides to make it my own

lines.text: If you are starting from scratch, I recommend using http://www.aviary.com to edit your background. You can use the gradient tool to add effects.
lines.text_raw: If you are starting from scratch, I recommend using http://www.aviary.com to edit your background. You can use the gradient tool to add effects.

lines.text: You can also find a template online that you can add on top of your background to help you place things.
lines.text_raw: You can also find a template online that you can add on top of your background to help you place things.

lines.text: Lastly, to add to the background, you will want to change the color scheme of the channel.
lines.text_raw: Lastly, to add to the background, you will want to change the color scheme of the channel.

lines.text: I hope this tutorial helped you!
lines.text_raw: I hope this tutorial helped you!

guide.summary: Make your YouTube page stand out!
guide.title: Make a YouTube Channel Background
